notes: Cloud services eligible for EU cybersecurity certification under EUCS scheme (in development)
ICT products and services can obtain EU cybersecurity certification; schemes cover various product categories
IoT devices eligible for certification under EUCC (Common Criteria based) or future schemes
Public sector may require certified products/services; Art 48 allows Member States to mandate certification
Financial entities may use certified products to demonstrate compliance with DORA requirements
Critical infrastructure operators may require certified products under NIS2 implementation
Healthcare IT products can be certified; may align with MDR cybersecurity requirements
Transport sector IT systems eligible for certification; may support UN R155 compliance
